name: APAC Data Innovation Summit 2020
content: Data Innovation Summit is designed to impact and shape the future of business and society by cross pollinating knowledge and experience in data management, advanced analytics, IOT and AI across organisations and regions. The event gathers the practitioners of today and the leaders for the future in one place to discuss ways to accelerate data and AI driven innovation and industrialize advanced analytics projects into production. The APAC Edition of the summit as an inaugural event that brings the region closer to the world-wide movement, ushering the community of data practitioners across countries and sectors to collaborate, benchmark, share and innovate.
